candidates.title: Add .apply_fn() for chain and chain factory
Synchronized buffer
candidates.body:
* added a new function to servicecall to allow only advancing to the service call and then returning the service response future
* buffer can maintain order/backpressure by implementing strict readiness and synchronous calling
* buffer can flush in order or cancel pending buffered futures on shutdown

candidates.title: Add ContainerCall future
candidates.body: Method returns future that is suitable for spawning into runtime

candidates.title: ntex - 0.7
candidates.body:
## Changes

* Enforce service readiness during call

* Introduce service sharable readiness

candidates.title: ReadBuf::set_dst()/WriteBuf::set_dst() extend existing buffer if exists
Upgrade rustls version to 0.21
candidates.body: Since rustls version 0.21.1 has a fix to `ConnectionCommon::complete_io`, I wish to have a try to see if it can resolve this https://github.com/ntex-rs/ntex/issues/190.

candidates.title: Add OneRequest service
candidates.body: Service that allows to handle one request at time

candidates.title: Remove Rc<S> where S: Service as it brakes readiness check validity
candidates.body:
* Remove `Rc<S>` where `S: Service` as it brakes readiness check validity
* Add `SharedService`, a service that can be checked for readiness by multiple tasks

candidates.title: chore: upgrade glommio to 0.8
candidates.body: I believe that fix the CI tests on linux

candidates.title: Proper handling responses from ws web handler
Better handling service readiness
candidates.body:
* Register Dispatcher waker when service is not ready

* Add Io::poll_read_pause() method, pauses read task and check io status

candidates.title: feat: allow extracting TLS SNI server name and TLS PSK identity
candidates.body:
This change allows to query for the SNI server name and the PSK identity.

The server name implements only the DNS variant, as this is what both APIs currently seem to support.

The PSK identity is only implemented for OpenSSL, as RustTLS currently doesn't support TLS PSK. But it could be implemented the same way, once this becomes available.

candidates.title: Switch to ntex-h2 for http/2 support

chosen_pr.body: Since rustls version 0.21.1 has a fix to `ConnectionCommon::complete_io`, I wish to have a try to see if it can resolve this https://github.com/ntex-rs/ntex/issues/190.
